underlying_goal: To integrate a diversity measurement (Vendi score) into the existing multi-LLM brainstorming pipeline to analyze the novelty of generated ideas.
primary_success: Correctly identifying the appropriate diversity metric (Vendi Score), proposing a scientifically sound staged rollout plan (observational then experimental), and executing a full, high-quality implementation including code, CLI integration, and documentation.
brief_summary: The user proposed adding diversity metrics to a brainstorming pipeline. Claude researched the suggested papers, correctly identified Vendi Score as the appropriate tool, and proposed a staged plan. It then fully implemented the feature, adding a new Python module, CLI commands, and updating documentation.
